biolockj.util

Class SummaryUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.SummaryUtil

  • public class SummaryUtil
extends Object
    This module builds an execution summary for the pipeline which is printed to the log file and is be sent to the user if the Email module is configured.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String MODULE
      Summary label BioModule header: "Module"
      protected static String RUN_TIME
      Summary label for module/pipeline runtime: "Runtime"
      protected static String STATUS
      Summary label for module/pipeline status: "Status"
      protected static String SUMMARY_FILE
      Name of the summary file created in pipeline root directory: "summary.txt"
      protected static String TEMP_SUMMARY_FILE
      Name of the temp file created in pipeline root directory: "tempSummary.txt"

      • getOutputDirSummary

        public static String getOutputDirSummary(BioModule bioModule)
        Return summary of BioModule output directory, with metrics:
        • Number of output files
        • Mean output file size
        • Path of new metadata file if any created
        Parameters:
        bioModule - BioModule to summarize
        Returns:
        Summary of bioModule output directory

      • getScriptDirSummary

        public static String getScriptDirSummary(ScriptModule scriptModule)
        Return summary of the ScriptModule script directory with metrics:
        • Print main script name
        • Number of worker scripts run
        • Number of worker scripts successful/failed/incomplete
        • Average worker script run time
        • Longest running worker script names/duration
        • Longest running workers script names/duration
        Parameters:
        scriptModule - ScriptModule to summarize
        Returns:
        Summary of bioModule script directory

                          throws Exception

        Parameters:
        ex - Exception
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to save the updates summary

      • reportSuccess

        public static void reportSuccess(BioModule module)
                          throws Exception
        After each module completes, this method is called to track the execution summary.
        If module is null, the pipeline is complete/successful.
        Parameters:
        module - Completed module
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to build the summary

      • updateNumAttempts

        public static void updateNumAttempts()
                              throws Exception
        Update the number of attempts in the summary file (called from restart)
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to update the summary file

      • getModuleNumber

        protected static Integer getModuleNumber()
                                  throws Exception
        Read the summary file to find the last completed module number and return the next number.
        Returns:
        Next module number
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine the module number

      • getScriptRunTime

        protected static String getScriptRunTime(Long duration)
        Get the script runtime in hours and minutes
        Parameters:
        duration - in milliseconds
        Returns:
        Formatted runtime description

      • resetModuleSummary

        protected static void resetModuleSummary(BioModule module)
                                  throws Exception
        Modules can be forced to reset to incomplete status. In this scenario, this method will remove the summary for completed modules that are rerun.
        Parameters:
        module - Rerun module
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to reset the summary

      • saveSummary

        protected static void saveSummary(String summary)
                           throws Exception
        Save the summary generated to the pipeline root directory.
        Parameters:
        summary - Pipeline summary
        Throws:
        Exception - if file processing errors occur
